titlestmt.titleproper: Preliminary Inventory to the Frederick Nossal papers
titlestmt.author: Prepared by Hoover Institution Archives staff

publicationstmt.p: Hoover Institution Archives. All rights reserved.

profiledesc.creation: Text converted and initial EAD tagging provided by Apex Data Services, Oct. 2000. Supplementary encoding and revision supplied by Xiuzhi Zhou.

change.item: Revised to update encoding and add unitid by Elizabeth Phillips
PUBLIC "-//Stanford University::Hoover Institution Archives//TEXT (US::CSt-H::::Frederick Nossal Papers)//EN" "nossalfr.sgm" converted from EAD 1.0 to 2002 by v1to02.cdl.xsl (2004-09-16).

note.label: Abstract
note.p: Drafts of writings, dispatches, clippings, serial issues, other printed matter, photographs, and slides, relating to political and other conditions in China, the Vietnamese War, political conditions elsewhere in Asia, and activities of the World Bank.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: The Hoover Institution Archives only allows access to copies of audiovisual items. To listen to sound recordings or to view videos or films during your visit, please contact the Archives at least two working days before your arrival. We will then advise you of the accessibility of the material you wish to see or hear. Please note that not all audiovisual material is immediately accessible.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: For copyright status, please contact the Hoover Institution Archives.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Frederick Nossal Papers, [Box no.], Hoover Institution Archives.

controlaccess.head: Access Points
controlaccess.corpname: International Bank for Reconstruction and Development.
controlaccess.subject: Vietnamese Conflict, 1961-1975.

bioghist.head: Biography
bioghist.p: Canadian journalist; Far East correspondent, 1959-1971, stationed in Peking, 1959-1960; information officer, World Bank, 1971-1979.
